page.title: 09Playground games.
page.content: We play all sorts of games out in the playground. We play skipping games, running games. Games have been going on for years. In our playgroynd we have printed games on the floor like hopscotch. We play netball, football and rounders. Most of the boys play football and most girls play rounders and netball. There are lots of new games out now. Boys sometimes play cricket in the Summer and girls play rounders. In rounders you have a bat and someone throws a ball at you and you have to hit it and run around the outside of four posts. There are people standing by the posts who can stop you running a rounder by catching the ball and touching the post.Cricket is played by having having two teams of 11. One batting and one fielding.
